take_average module¶

take_average.average(hr, time, mins=1)[source]¶

Takes a running average of HR data :param hr: (ndarray) An array of heart rates :param mins: (int) Number of minutes to take HR over :returns: An ndarray of average heart rate at each time point

take_average.get_interval(time, mins=1)[source]¶

Figures out how many points in mins minutes :param time: (ndarray) An array of times :param mins: (int) Number of minutes to take HR over :returns: The length in data points of mins minutes
